test.name: Cadastrar usuário e fazer uma consulta pelo id

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '96', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "Lima5", "email": "andy115@qa.com.br", "password": "teste123", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
